entry.title: RT Tesla: Enter your destination & your Tesla will automatically include Supercharging stops in your route
entry.summary: RT Tesla Enter your destination & your Tesla will automatically include Supercharging stops in your route Lawrence 4.68e+3 🔋: Wyoming desolation in the plains. No range anxiety in my #Tesla makes the trip awesome. Superchargers and route planning have never failed me. 🙌
